about:
I am Kartik Sachdeva
I am currently pursuing B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering from ABES-Engineering College.
I am an Information Security and Machine Learning enthusiast.
I am currently working as Cyber Security Intern at Gurugram Police Cyber Security Summer Internship Program.

Thank you for visiting my profile.
Feel free to contact me on LinkedIn.
Have a great Day !
